result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Maeve E. Schwabe

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:13 pm 
INCLUDES 21CF1546, 22CF147, & 22CF770. 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Def appears in person with Atty Sharon Gisselman.  
VRCW. 
State moves to: 
In 22CF147: Cts. 1 & 2>>D&RI. 
In 22CF770: Cts. 1 & 2>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 21CF1546: Ct. 1 (Possess with Intent -THC)>>NO CONTEST. 
                     : Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 22CF770: Ct. 3 (Credit Card - Theft by Acquisition)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty on all 3 but defers entry of judgment on Ct. 1 in 21CF1546. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 21CF1546: Ct. 1>>DEOJ for 18 months with conditions as outlined in written agreement - if def successfully completes terms of agreement, this charge to be DISMISSED. 

In 21CF1546: Ct. 2 & In 22CF770: Ct. 3>>SWH for 1 year probation - CONDITIONS: AODA; assessment/treatment as deemed appropriate by the dept; absolute sobriety; fulltime employment/school or if not, perform 9 hours CS per week; letter of apology to SRW in 22CF770; DNA sample/surcharge; CC. 

COURT finds the def entitled to 1 day jail credit in both files. 

DEOJ Review set for March 8, 2024 at 10:45 am with Br. 3 JA in 21CF1546. 
Adj: 2:32 pm
Amended Plea questionnaire, waiver of rights w/Amended Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 13, 2022 at 02:10 pm.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:31 am 
INCLUDES 21CF1546, 22CF147, & 22CF770. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person with Atty Sharon Gisselman. 
Date and time set for plea/sentencing hrg. 
State requests matter be reset to allow deft to pay fee for DEOJ. 
COURT directs parties to see JA to reset. 
Adj: 9:32 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 12, 2022 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Maeve E. Schwabe
Current: 700 Madge Street 21, Edgar, WI 54426   (Effective: 06-22-2022)
Prior: 700 Madge Street -21, Edgar, WI 54426
Pre-trial conference on July 19, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 10:14 am 
INCLUDES 21CF1546 & 22CF147. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person with Atty Sharon Gisselman. 
Date and time was set for plea/sentencing hrg. 
State notes deft has new charges coming which will require time to comply with victim's rights. 
OTR: 10:15 am BOTR: 10:16 am 
PTC set for 7/19/2022 at 10:30 am with Br. 3 JA. 
Adj: 10:16 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 21, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Status conference on May 19, 2022 at 09:15 am.
ATTIC: Intake Report - Marathon County Pretrial Services Program
Status conference on April 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (2) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

Clerk: Marisa; Case called: 2:06 pm 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Defendant appears by Zoom Video from MCJ with Atty Paige Metzman. 
Reading Waived. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived. 

COURT ORDERS: $1000 sig bond - CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (2) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening
- Prints and photograph. 

BRANCH 3 CASE. 
PTC with JA: 2/4/2022 at 2:40 pm. 
Prelim: 3/25/2022 at 10:40 am. 
PTC with JA: 4/5/2022 at 10:10 am.
